long_description: Pedro GO! is an eco-friendly lube that keeps your chain running smoothly during clean riding conditions. This canola-based, low viscosity lube is biodegradable and penetrates easily into the rollers and plates of the chain for mess-free lubrication. GO! is durable and waterproof, yet cleans easily with OranJ Peelz, sold separately.
short_description: Pedro GO! is an eco-friendly lube that keeps your chain running smoothly during clean riding conditions.
